help: When defining a new analysis, we expect a certain set of files. This is a list of those files.

transformations.json.help: This file contains the transformations that will be applied to the data, and a description of how they fit together.

parameters.json.help: This file contains overwrites of the basic Cosmap parameters. For example, the output that will be generated.

transformations.py.help: This file contains the actual code that will be executed. It contains definitions of all the transformations

config.py.help: This file contiains the pydantic models that define the configuration data that is unique to this particular analysis.
